game.name: Useful Cat
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Useful Cat is an arcade and mind game. A quick reaction and a keen mind will bring you closer to victory over the approaching danger. Placing explosives, solve math problems quickly and correctly, on which everything depends!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Useful Cat is an arcade and mind game. A quick reaction and a keen mind will bring you closer to victory over the approaching danger. Placing explosives, solve math problems quickly and correctly, on which everything depends!
